page.title: 03My Day in Clovelly
page.content: My name is{Breege Whiten. }I have recently moved from Halifax. I get up at seven o'clock and I get dressed. Every morning I have fruit and bread for breakfast then I go to school. Some of our desks are wooden and some are plastic.My friends are called Rebecca Annis and Sarah Byford.We come in a blue Triumph a mile every morning My hobby is playing the recorder and tennis. I live at 130 East Dyke cottage.My best T.V programme is Robin Hood.Jet trainers from Chivenor come across every day.My sister is Saffron and my brother is Seth.My mum is Patricia and my dad is called Peter and he is a driver.There are friesian cows in the fields around us.I am 8 and I like fashionable clothes like jump suits.
